page.title: 14Churches in Ribchester
page.content: We have 5 churches in the Ribchester area,2 Catholic churches,2 Anglican churches and 1 Evangelical Protestant church. The Parish church was mainly built in the 13th Century but other parts were built later on. The other Parish church STYDD was probably built in the 11th century. STYDD church has been altered many times. The earliest part of the building is in the North wall. It is a good example of Norman work. Our Lady of the Way Side is a Catholic chapel. It must be very old because it has an old toilet that is just a hole. It has no priest of its own. The Evangelical Protestant church is 91 years old. The pulpit is older than the church because it came from another church.They do not have the pulpit at the side, instead they have it in the middle.
